articles.title: “1917” has won best drama film at the Golden Globes.
articles.description: BEVERLY HILLS, California (AP) — “1917” has won best drama film at the Golden Globes.
articles.content:
BEVERLY HILLS, California (AP) 1917 has won best drama film at the Golden Globes.
